body: When we destroy a block, we first destroy all the nodes it contains. So nothing leaks. Lint tests for this. We use `all_node` to make sure we don't leak any nodes even if the graph gets destructed when not all nodes in it are added to a block.
body_html: When we destroy a block, we first destroy all the nodes it contains. So nothing leaks. Lint tests for this. We use all_node to make sure we don't leak any nodes even if the graph gets destructed when not all nodes in it are added to a block.
